nodes.text: According to the Jawa trader Klikk, the owner of an RX-Series pilot droid lost control of the unit while on the planet Naboo. Just as the droid's owner had stepped down from a starship boarding ramp, the droid took off in the starship. The Naboo system observation post employed starfighters to stop the wayward pilot droid, but it managed to jump to lightspeed, on course to the region of the galaxy of the planets Bothawui, Nal Hutta, and Rodia.
